txt.en:
'We are ready to trek onwards to reunite with my fellowship, but Linden is still sick. I think the poor bear is starving... his paw has been at his stomach all day. Linden will surely liven up if he has some meat in his belly. The moose in this forest should do nicely.

'If you can hunt the moose for me and bring me some meat, we should be able to get underway soon. I am so sorry for all this trouble!

'The moose graze in the forest surrounding us. Thank you, my friend!'
'Oh thank you, [placeholder]! I will give this to Linden right away.'
'I know it is a burden, but if you can just gather some of that moose-meat for Linden, I will pack my bags and not bother you again.'
Cenlieg has managed to locate his fellows, who are travelling north-west towards an unknown location.
Moose can be found throughout the forest surrounding Kauppa-kohta.\n\nCenlieg has asked you to hunt for some moose-meat to feed his bear-friend, Linden.
Cenlieg is at Kauppa-kohta,  on the eastern shore of the lake.\n\nYou should bring the meat you gathered back to Cenlieg.
